page.title: 06PENICUIK COMMUNITY CENTRES
page.content: The Carnethy Community Centre is open all day Monday to Friday. On Saturdays it is open from 8 a.m. until 11 p.m. The activities vary from board games to canoeing and fly fishing. There are mother and toddler groups, swimming clubs, disco's, carpet bowling, etc. The prices for Annual Subscription vary from 75p to Â£2.50. The prices per session vary from 20p-30p. Being such a big club the number of helpers is around 35. In total the number of members is 1100. There are 33 different clubs. The club caters for all ages from toddlers to old age pensioners. Ladywood Leisure Centre is also open all day. There are activities such as karate, volleyball and badminton. For adults who like sport there is badminton, trampolining and keep fit.
